mapper.select: SELECT k.knowledge_id, k.name, k.type, k.file_size, k.mime_type, k.customer_id, c.company_name AS customer_name, k.summary, k.status, k.upload_user_id, u.realname AS upload_user_name, k.create_time FROM crm_knowledge k LEFT JOIN crm_customer c ON k.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN manager_user u ON k.upload_user_id = u.user_id WHERE k.knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId}
